languages.text: {n}В руке Тервантьяса возникает устройство с непомерно длинной иглой.{/n} "Постарайся не дергаться, когда я нанижу тебя, мотылек. Игла должна пройти сквозь твой камень души, сердце и спинной мозг, чтобы взять все три пробы разом. А она такая хрупкая..."

{n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."
languages.original_text: {n}В руке Тервантьяса возникает устройство с непомерно длинной иглой.{/n} "Постарайся не дергаться, когда я нанижу тебя, мотылек. Игла должна пройти сквозь твой камень души, сердце и спинной мозг, чтобы взять все три пробы разом. А она такая хрупкая..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so I that can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

{n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so I that can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

{n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

{n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

{n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは異様な長さの針のついた器具を取り出した。{/n}「もがくでないぞ、小さき虫けらよ。この針は、お前の魂縛石、心臓、そして背骨を貫かねばならぬ。そうしてこそ、一度に3つのサンプルを得られるのだ。そして、それはとても壊れやすい…」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは異様な長さの針のついた器具を取り出した。{/n}「もがくでないぞ、小さき虫けらよ。この針は、お前の魂縛石、心臓、そして背骨を貫かねばならぬ。そうしてこそ、一度に3つのサンプルを得られるのだ。そして、それはとても壊れやすい…」

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯取出一根极长的尖针。{/n}“别乱动，小虫子。我需要用这根针穿透你的灵魂石、你的心脏和你的脊椎，这样才能同时收集到三个样本。这根针相当很容易断……”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯取出一根极长的尖针。{/n}“别乱动，小虫子。我需要用这根针穿透你的灵魂石、你的心脏和你的脊椎，这样才能同时收集到三个样本。这根针相当很容易断……”

languages.text: {n}Tervantias sort un appareil doté d'une aiguille particulièrement longue.{/n} « Essayez de ne pas bouger, vermisseau. L'aiguille doit traverser votre pierre-esprit, votre cœur et votre colonne vertébrale pour me permettre de récupérer les trois échantillons en un seul prélèvement. Et elle est si fragile... »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias sort un appareil doté d'une aiguille particulièrement longue.{/n} « Essayez de ne pas bouger, vermisseau. L'aiguille doit traverser votre pierre-esprit, votre cœur et votre colonne vertébrale pour me permettre de récupérer les trois échantillons en un seul prélèvement. Et elle est si fragile... »

languages.text: {n}Tervantias saca un dispositivo con una aguja sorprendentemente larga.{/n} «Intenta no retorcerte, pequeño insecto. La aguja tiene que atravesar tu joya espiritual, tu corazón y tu médula espinal para que pueda extraer las tres muestras a la vez. Y es muy frágil...».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias saca un dispositivo con una aguja sorprendentemente larga.{/n} «Intenta no retorcerte, pequeño insecto. La aguja tiene que atravesar tu joya espiritual, tu corazón y tu médula espinal para que pueda extraer las tres muestras a la vez. Y es muy frágil...».

languages.text: {n}Tervantias zückt ein Gerät mit einer ungewöhnlich langen Nadel.{/n} "Das sticht jetzt ein wenig, kleines Insekt. Die Nadel durchbohrt Euren Seelenstein, Euer Herz und euer Rückgrat, damit ich alle drei Proben auf einmal nehmen kann. Wie zerbrechlich Ihr doch seid ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias zückt ein Gerät mit einer ungewöhnlich langen Nadel.{/n} "Das sticht jetzt ein wenig, kleines Insekt. Die Nadel durchbohrt Euren Seelenstein, Euer Herz und euer Rückgrat, damit ich alle drei Proben auf einmal nehmen kann. Wie zerbrechlich Ihr doch seid ..."

languages.text: {n}Tervantias, iğnesi aşırı uzun olan bir aygıt hazırlıyor.{/n} "Kıvranmamaya çalış böcek. İğne; ruh taşından, kalbinden ve omurgandan geçebilmeli ki üç örneği de aynı anda toplayabileyim. Çok da kırılgandır..."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias produces a device fitted with an unusually long needle.{/n} "Try not to squirm, little insect. The needle needs to go through your spirit stone, heart, and spine so that I can collect all three samples at once. And it is so very fragile..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias, aşırı uzun bir iğnesi bulunan bir aygıt hazırlıyor.{/n} "Kıvranmamaya çalış böcekcik. İğne, ruh taşından, kalbinden ve omurgandan geçebilmeli ki üç örneği de aynı anda toplayabileyim. Çok da kırılgandır..."
